data.message: i want verified my official page and this one id .... please facebook :)

replies.message: Hey Ali. We verify profiles or Pages to help you be sure that they are who they claim to be. This feature is currently only available for well-known public figures and Pages with large followings that have the potential to be faked or claimed by other people.  -Chantal
I want to check my page

A page of a client of mine has a significant number of fans (https://www.facebook.com/Labellamafiabrasil) and lots of fakes (or we can say, pages that might confuse users) as you can see in the printscreen http://i.imgur.com/5QlfMSO.png but unfortunatelly I had the "verified page" sign negated. :'( cc Willian
Thank you facebook for giving me the opportunity to once again  come in contact with my Family and friends that I had lost track of for more than 40 years ,God Bless !
